entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as a dark, rippling, faceless figure, shimmering and indistinct upon the plinth. He was struggling to throw off the suffocating mass.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as screaming 'MASTER!' and being trapped under her statue.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as sounding frightened for the first time in the story.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as a tiny baby croaking feebly on the floor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as making to run out from behind his statue guard and being locked in the coils of a creature.

relationships.description: Voldemort was struggling to throw off the suffocating mass that Bellatrix was trapped under.
Dumbledore bellowed 'Stay where you are, Harry!'
Harry's scar burst open when Voldemort was present.
